title: Trailers
description: "Le Vann is a great new talent, her prose taut and addictive, and full of truth. Readers expecting a William Sutcliffe-style look at university life are sure to be surprised, but not disappointed" - The Times "A modern British flatshare story ... saved from the usual role call of arguments, armours and angst by Le Vann's caustic observations and the vulnerability that shines through her "get a grip" attitude" - Elle "A sharp satire on university life, reminding every ex-student how quickly the idealistic sheen wears off" - Heat
author: Kate le Vann
